html.p: 2 is added to your Time Track for time spent in the village.

text.p:
You must march on to a location you haven't visited before, 2 is added to your Time Track. Will you journey:
Eastwards to the lands of the Frost Giants?
North then north-east to Slate Peak?
South then west to the Mist Crypts?
You have not yet been to the Dragon Conclave, you must do so now; march off east-north-eastwards.
